fullText: This is a theatrical experience that expands the possibilities of drama in ways both technologically sophisticated and humanly touching. It's a remarkable achievement that deserves to be seen by the widest possible audience.
dtliExcerpt: This is a theatrical experience that expands the possibilities of drama in ways both technologically sophisticated and humanly touching. It's a remarkable achievement that deserves to be seen by the widest possible audience.
bwwExcerpt: The technical elements alone are breathtaking - the kaleidoscopic wash of Paule Constable's lighting with its splashes of DayGlo fluorescence; the explosive cascades and geometric graphics of Finn Ross' video designs; the sensory grip of Ian Dickinson's wraparound sound; the pulsing jolts of Adrian Sutton's techno score; the bold starkness of Bunny Christie's set, a sterile white cube divided by grid lines and housing endless hatches and trapdoors that disgorge an astonishing cornucopia of props.
showScoreExcerpt: This is a theatrical experience that expands the possibilities of drama in ways both technologically sophisticated and humanly touching. It's a remarkable achievement that deserves to be seen by the widest possible audience.
